metadata.name: UAC Bypass via Windows Firewall Snap-In Hijack
metadata.comment: Detects attempts to bypass User Account Control (UAC) by hijacking the Microsoft Management Console (MMC) Windows Firewall snap-in

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\mmc.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('wf.msc')) AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\werfault.exe')))

output.summary: Detects attempts to bypass User Account Control (UAC) by hijacking the Microsoft Management Console (MMC) Windows Firewall snap-in
